p: An important limitation of MR in drug development is that most GWAS datasets pertain to disease risk rather than progression. In other words, most MR studies to date predict whether an intervention could prevent disease, rather than slow or hinder its progression. For example, although MR studies show an inverse relationship between vitamin D levels and multiple sclerosis risk, no significant association has been found with multiple sclerosis severity nor age at onset ( Rhead et al., 2016 ).
